name: AutoPvP
title: AutoPvP
title_original: AutoPvP (automatic setup of PvP maps and fights)
author: BinbinHfr
description: Automatic PvP mod to help you setting up PvP maps and fights, with automatic force creation and settings, random player placement and resources allocation.
description_original: Automatic PvP mod to help you setting up PvP maps and fights, with automatic force creation and settings, random player placement proposals, starting resources allocation and a special Rebirth Technology to spice up the game !
